N-Back Task.Description: The N-Back Task measures working memory ability - these data are for the condition 2-back

ExperimentName.Description: Name of the experiment used to generate the data file

DataFile.Basename.Description: Name of data output from E-prime

ExperimentVersion.Description: Version of the task used to generate the data file

RandomSeed.Description: Auto-generated random seed used for randomization

RuntimeVersion.Description: E-run version used to run experiment

RuntimeVersionExpected.Description: E-run version expected to run experiment

SessionDate.Description: Date of experiment; based on the computer

SessionStartDateTimeUtc.Description: Date and time of experiment in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)

SessionTime.Description: Time of task based on the computer

Running[Block].Description: Name of list of trial types

Levels.List1: Single list of trial (i.e., procedure) types

Trial.Description: Trial number within the corresponding Procedure[Block]

B2List1.Description: Trial list for the first block of the task

B2List1.Cylce.Description: Cycle list for the first block of the task

B2List1.Sample.Description: Sample list for the first block of the task

B2List2.Description: Trial list for the second block of the task

B2List2.Cylce.Description: Cycle list for the second block of the task

B2List2.Sample.Description: Sample list for the second block of the task

B2Stim.ACC.Description: Accuracy of participant response for each trial

B2Stim.CRESP.Description: Correct response for the each trial

B2Stim.DurationError.Description: Difference in stimuli duration and the intended duration - when the event is terminated by a response, a value of - 99999 is used (i.e., since the duration error cannot be computed in that sutation)

B2Stim.OnsetDelay.Description: Time from stimuli onset time and the expected/target onset time

B2Stim.OnsetTime.Description: Time from start of task to stimuli presentation

B2Stim.OnsetToOnsetTime.Description: Time from the current trial and the next trial's stimulis OnsetTime

B2Stim.RESP.Description: Response to stimuli for each trial

B2Stim.RT.Description: Response time to stimuli for each trial

B2Stim.RTTime.Description: Time from start of task to response for each trial

Condition.Description: Condition type of the presented stimulus

Levels.Fill: The presented stimulus meets the criteria for 2-back response (i.e., current stimui matches stimuli presented two trials previously)
Levels.Target: The presented stimulus meets the criteria for a 2-back response (i.e., current stimui does NOT match stimuli presented two trials previously)
Levels: The presented stimulus is not a letter

correct.Description: Correct response for the each trial

Running[Trial].Description: Name of list of corresponding to procedure trail

Levels.B2List1: List containing stimuli for first block
Levels.B2List2: List containing stimuli for second block
